meanings.definition: A male member of a royal family
meanings.sent1: The princes attended the royal ball with their family.
meanings.sent2: The princes lived in the grand palace with the king and queen.
meanings.sent3: The princes joked about who would inherit the throne first.
meanings.sent4: The princes' presence in the kingdom was like a shining beacon of tradition.
meanings.sent5: The princes' noble lineage was evident in their regal demeanor.

meanings.sent1: The princes governed their small kingdom with wisdom and fairness.
meanings.sent2: The princes' subjects respected their leadership in the principality.
meanings.sent3: The princes organized a grand feast to celebrate their rule.
meanings.sent4: The princes' authority over the land was as solid as the castle walls.
meanings.sent5: The princes' decisions shaped the destiny of the principality.

meanings.definition: A person of high rank or importance
meanings.sent1: The business magnate was considered one of the princes of industry.
meanings.sent2: The academic world regarded him as one of the intellectual princes.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer was hailed as a prince of style by the media.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, she was known as the princes of pop.
meanings.sent5: The philanthropist was seen as a prince of generosity in the community.
